**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is a technology and innovation organization offering hands\\-on training and project\\-based internships in software development, web technologies, AI, data, and cybersecurity. The company focuses on bridging the gap between academic learning and industry requirements through live projects and expert mentorship.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Web Developer Intern, you will work on designing, developing, and maintaining dynamic websites and web applications. This internship is ideal for students or graduates who are passionate about coding, UI design, and building responsive web solutions from concept to deployment.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as React.js, Bootstrap, or Tailwind CSS
* Work with backend technologies such as Node.js, Django, or PHP for full\\-stack development
* Collaborate with designers to create clean, user\\-friendly web interfaces
* Integrate APIs and manage efficient client‚Äìserver communication
* Optimize websites for performance, speed, and SEO best practices
* Debug and resolve technical issues to ensure a smooth user experience



**Requirements** 



* Currently pursuing or completed a Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, IT, or related fields
* Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript with basic knowledge of frontend frameworks
* Familiarity with backend technologies such as Node.js, Python (Flask/Django), or PHP
* Understanding of databases like MySQL or MongoDB and Git version control
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and creativity in design implementation



**What You Will Gain** 



* Certificate of Internship
* Hands\\-on experience working on real\\-world web projects with live deployment
* Mentorship from experienced developers and designers
* Opportunity to build a strong, professional web development portfolio
* Networking and placement assistance post\\-internship
* Potential full\\-time role based on performance

title: Senior Software Engineer - Site Reliability
description:
**About Freshworks:**




 Organizations everywhere struggle under the crushing costs and complexities of ‚Äúsolutions‚Äù that promise to simplify their lives. To create better experience for their customers and employees. To help them grow. Software is a choice that can make or break a business. Create better or worse experiences. Propel or throttle growth. Business software has become a blocker instead of ways to get work done.
   

  

**There‚Äôs another option. Freshworks. With a fresh vision for how the world works.**
  

 At Freshworks, we build uncomplicated service software that delivers exceptional customer and employee experiences. Our enterprise\\-grade solutions are powerful, yet easy to use, and quick to deliver results. Our people\\-first approach to AI eliminates friction, making employees more effective and organizations more productive. Over 72,000 companies, including Bridgestone, New Balance, Nucor, S\\&P Global, and Sony Music, trust Freshworks‚Äô customer experience (CX) and employee experience (EX) software to fuel customer loyalty and service efficiency. And over 4,500 Freshworks employees make this possible, all around the world.
   

  

***Fresh vision. Real impact. Come build it with us.***



**Job Description**
* With 4‚Äì6 years of experience, you‚Äôll drive automation, optimize Kubernetes \\& cloud infrastructure(AWS) and enhance system availability, reliability, security through advanced Linux scripting, and monitoring.
* Development experience with Java Springboot , Ruby on Rails and exposure to AI tools will be an added advantage.
* Manage user accounts, permissions, and file systems.
* Perform advanced Linux administration and shell scripting tasks.
* Automate system administration tasks using shell scripts.
* Design and implement CI/CD pipelines for automating deployments and testing.
* Utilize popular CI/CD tools such as Jenkins and GitLab CI/CD.
* Integrate CI/CD pipelines with version control systems and container orchestration platforms.
* Set up and manage monitoring and logging solutions.
* Use tools for collecting, analyzing, and visualizing application and infrastructure logs.
* Troubleshoot issues based on monitoring and logging data.
* Utilize Git for version control and collaboration.
* Perform branching, merging, and conflict resolution using Git.
* Set up and manage Git repositories.
* Work effectively with developers, operations teams, and other stakeholders.
* Document DevOps processes and procedures.
* Troubleshoot complex DevOps issues.
* Identify root causes of problems and implement solutions.


**Qualifications**
* Experience: 4\\-6 years
* Advanced understanding of programming concepts (data structures, algorithms, object\\-oriented programming).
* In\\-depth knowledge of Linux administration and shell scripting.
* Proficiency in using common Linux commands and tools for system administration.
* Extensive experience with Git.
* Proficiency in Git commands for branching, merging, and conflict resolution.
* Expert knowledge of CI/CD principles and best practices.
* Proficiency in CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, Azure DevOps Pipelines).
* Experience in setting up and managing monitoring and logging solutions.
* Advanced communication and collaboration skills.
* Advanced problem\\-solving and analytical skills.
* Knowledge of RDBMS like MySQL, PostgreSQL.
* Expertise in database design, normalization, and optimization.
* Strong understanding of SQL and proficiency in writing complex queries.
* Experience in database administration tasks such as backup, recovery, security, and performance tuning.
* Extensive experience with Kubernetes environments.
* Deep understanding of Kubernetes architecture and components.
* Proficiency in using kubectl commands and managing Kubernetes resources.
* Experience in setting up and managing Kubernetes clusters.
* Experience with major cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Familiarity with cloud\\-specific DevOps tools and services for deployments, monitoring, and scaling.


**Additional Information**

 At Freshworks, we have fostered an environment that enables everyone to find their true potential, purpose, and passion, welcoming colleagues of all backgrounds, genders, sexual orientations, religions, and ethnicities. We are committed to providing equal opportunity and believe that diversity in the workplace creates a more vibrant, richer environment that boosts the goals of our employees, communities, and business.
 **Fresh vision. Real impact. Come build it with us.**

title: WebM developer
description:
WEBM Developer (IBM webMethods / IBM Hybrid Integration)
 



  





 Role Overview
 



  





 We are seeking an experienced WEBM (IBM webMethods) Developer with strong hands\\-on expertise in IBM webMethods integration technologies. The critical differentiator for this role is extensive hands\\-on experience with IBM Hybrid Integration (IWHI), including designing, building, and managing hybrid integration solutions across cloud and on\\-prem environments.
 



  





 The ideal candidate will be responsible for end\\-to\\-end integration development, API enablement, and support of enterprise integration landscapes using IBM‚Äôs hybrid integration stack.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities
 



  





 Design, develop, test, and deploy integration solutions using IBM webMethods.
 



  





 Build and manage hybrid integrations using IBM Hybrid Integration (IWHI) across on\\-prem and cloud platforms.
 



  





 Develop and maintain services, APIs, and integrations using webMethods Integration Server.
 



  





 Implement API\\-led and event\\-driven integration patterns.
 



  





 Work with webMethods Designer, Integration Server, and related components for integration development.
 



  





 Configure and manage adapters (JDBC, SAP, FTP, REST, SOAP, etc.).
 



  





 Implement error handling, logging, monitoring, and performance tuning.
 



  





 Collaborate with application, infrastructure, and business teams to understand integration requirements.
 



  





 Support integration deployments across Dev, QA, and Production environments.
 



  





 Troubleshoot and resolve integration and performance issues.
 



  





 Ensure adherence to integration best practices, security standards, and governance.
 



  





  





 Mandatory Skills \\& Experience
 



  





 Strong hands\\-on experience with IBM webMethods integration platform.
 



  





 Extensive practical experience with IBM Hybrid Integration (IWHI) ‚Äì mandatory and critical differentiator.
 



  





 Experience working with:
 



  





 webMethods Integration Server
 



  





 webMethods Designer
 



  





 REST \\& SOAP web services
 



  





 Strong understanding of enterprise integration patterns.
 



  





 Experience integrating cloud and on\\-premise systems.
 



  





 Proficiency in XML, JSON, XSLT, and data transformation.
 



  





 Experience with error handling, logging, and monitoring in webMethods.

description:

**Job Description \\& Summary**
 At PwC, our people in business application consulting specialise in consulting services for a variety of business applications, helping clients optimise operational efficiency. These individuals analyse client needs, implement software solutions, and provide training and support for seamless integration and utilisation of business applications, enabling clients to achieve their strategic objectives.
   

  

 As a business application consulting generalist at PwC, you will provide consulting services for a wide range of business applications. You will leverage a broad understanding of various software solutions to assist clients in optimising operational efficiency through analysis, implementation, training, and support.
   

  

  


 Why PWC
   

  


 At PwC, you will be part of a vibrant community of solvers that leads with trust and creates distinctive outcomes for¬†our clients and communities. This purpose\\-led and values\\-driven work, powered by technology in an environment that drives innovation, will enable you to make a tangible impact in the real world. We reward your contributions, support your wellbeing, and offer inclusive benefits, flexibility programmes and mentorship that will help you thrive in work and life. Together, we grow, learn, care, collaborate, and create a future of infinite experiences for¬†each other. Learn more about us.
   

  

 At PwC, we believe in providing equal employment opportunities, without any discrimination on the grounds of gender, ethnic background, age, disability, marital status, sexual orientation, pregnancy, gender identity or expression, religion or other beliefs, perceived differences and status protected by law. We strive to create an environment where each one of our people can bring their true selves and contribute to their personal growth and the firm‚Äôs growth. To enable this, we have zero tolerance for any discrimination and harassment based on the above considerations.
   

  

  



 Job Description \\& Summary:
 



 We are seeking an experienced‚ÄØTechnical Lead‚ÄØwith‚ÄØ10\\+ years of hands\\-on software development experience‚ÄØacross‚ÄØfrontend and backend technologies. The ideal candidate will lead system design, drive technical decisions, mentor teams, and ensure the delivery of scalable, high\\-quality solutions while collaborating closely with product, architecture, and business stakeholders.
 


 ¬†
   

  

  

  




 Responsibilities:
   



* Technical Leadership


* Lead end\\-to\\-end‚ÄØarchitecture, design, and implementation‚ÄØof scalable web applications.


* Define and enforce‚ÄØcoding standards, best practices, and technical guidelines.


* Make key decisions on‚ÄØtechnology stack, frameworks, tools, and design patterns.


* Review code, perform design reviews, and ensure technical excellence.‚ÄØLead team in migrating the legacy application‚ÄØprocesses from‚ÄØStruts 1\\.0‚ÄØto a‚ÄØReact\\-based frontend‚ÄØwith‚ÄØSpring Boot microservices backend based on approved BRD.


* Upgrading the application runtime‚ÄØfrom‚ÄØJDK 5 to JDK 21


* Rewriting Oracle\\-based database logic‚ÄØ(procedures, functions, jobs, business rules) into‚ÄØEDB/PostgreSQL


* Implementing CI/CD pipelines‚ÄØto streamline development and deployment workflows.


* Maintaining latest version of technical stack, closure of security vulnerabilities


* Performance optimization techniques implementation in project.


* Application \\& Architecture Modernization:


* Lead the migration from a Struts 1\\.0 monolithic system to a‚ÄØmodern React \\+ Spring Boot microservices architecture.


* Architect and implement modular, RESTful microservices to support frontend/backend separation and scalable deployment.


* Upgrade the core application codebase from‚ÄØJava 5 to Java 21, modernizing syntax, handling deprecated APIs, and
 

 leveraging
 

 new Java features such as records, sealed classes, and virtual threads.


* Define coding standards, refactor legacy components, and ensure high\\-performance, secure code throughout the stack.



 ¬†
   

  



 ¬†
   

  




 Mandatory skill sets:
 


 ¬†
   

  




 Ensure frontend implementation in‚ÄØReactJS‚ÄØaligns with best practices in responsive design, API integration, and user experience.
 






 ¬†

title: Senior Software Engineer - Java
description:
Our vision for the future is based on the idea that transforming financial lives starts by giving our people the freedom to transform their own. We have a flexible work environment, and fluid career paths. We not only encourage but celebrate internal mobility. We also recognize the importance of purpose, well\\-being, and work\\-life balance. Within Empower and our communities, we work hard to create a welcoming and inclusive environment, and our associates dedicate thousands of hours to volunteering for causes that matter most to them.
   

  

 Chart your own path and grow your career while helping more customers achieve financial freedom. Empower Yourself.
   

  

 As a Senior Java Developer, you will be involved in all stages of the project lifecycle from requirements to development, to implementation in production environments. This senior position is very hands\\-on and requires a strong ability to adapt to challenging problems and an intense desire to work as part of a cohesive team. All team members are expected to keep abreast of the latest industry trends, technologies, and frameworks and to display industry competitive skills and techniques.
   

  

**What Will You Do**
* Participate in the design, solution, code, troubleshooting, resolve, and test software features and components in an Agile/Scrum environment.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to gather and refine software requirements.
* Lead coding efforts for specific modules or features.
* Troubleshoot and resolve complex software issues.
* Participate in code reviews and enforce coding standards.
* Contribute to architectural decisions and design discussions.


**What Will You Bring**
* 5\\+ years of strong back\\-end engineering experience in Java specifically in Spring, Spring boot framework would be an advantage.
* 5\\+ years of strong experience with Oracle and PL/SQL or similar database development
* Proven Java experience designing and implementing complex systems, with exposure to varied architectural patterns, integrations, and responsibilities beyond isolated service development.
* Experience with RESTful API development.
* Knowledge of relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and ORM tools.
* Familiarity with cloud platform AWS and Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes.
* Proficient in version control systems.
* Experience with build tools like Maven or Gradle.
* Strong understanding of multithreading and concurrency.
* Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies.
* Bachelor's degree in related field or an equivalent combination of professional experience and/or training required


**What Will Set You Apart**
* Strong communication skills to engage with the business on requirement discussions.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.


 This job description is not intended to be an exhaustive list of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications of the job. The employer has the right to revise this job description at any time. You will be evaluated in part based on your performance of the responsibilities and/or tasks listed in this job description. You may be required perform other duties that are not included on this job description. The job description is not a contract for employment, and either you or the employer may terminate employment at any time, for any reason, as per terms and conditions of your employment contract.
   

  

 We are an equal opportunity employer with a commitment to diversity. All individuals, regardless of personal characteristics, are encouraged to apply. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, pregnancy, religion, physical or mental disability, military or veteran status, genetic information, or any other status protected by applicable state or local law.

title: Hard Coder Interns: Apply if you can automate anything
description:
**Company Description**

 Purpose299\\.fund is a micro venture capital fund focused on supporting technology\\-driven entrepreneurs who prioritize strong conviction over convenience. The fund invests in founders with a clear vision and determination to create impactful technological innovations. Purpose299\\.fund is dedicated to fostering creativity, innovation, and forward\\-thinking technology solutions in the startup community. Joining Purpose299\\.fund means contributing to a mission\\-focused ecosystem built to empower transformative ventures.
   




**Role Description**

 The Hard Coder Intern will be responsible for designing and automating efficient solutions to address technical problems within the team. Day\\-to\\-day tasks will include developing and testing automation scripts, optimizing existing processes, and working collaboratively to deliver results. Candidates must demonstrate strong technical acumen and a passion for problem\\-solving. This is a full\\-time, on\\-site role based in Bengaluru, and offers exposure to various leading\\-edge technologies and real\\-world challenges while fostering innovation within a collaborative environment.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, or JavaScript
* Strong understanding of automation principles and frameworks
* Problem\\-solving and analytical skills to identify and address technical challenges
* Basic knowledge of algorithms and data structures
* Ability to work in a collaborative environment and meet deadlines
* Experience with debugging, testing, and optimizing code is a plus
* Enthusiasm for technology and willingness to learn and adapt
* Pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
**Company:** 
 OpsTree Global
   

  

**Website:** 
 Visit Website
   

  

**Business Type:** 
 Small/Medium Business
   

  

**Company Type:** 
 Product \\& Service
   

  

**Business Model:** 
 B2B2C
   

  

**Funding Stage:** 
 Bootstrapped
   

  

**Industry:** 
 Software Development
   

  

**Salary Range:** 
 ‚Çπ 12\\-24 Lacs PA
   

  

**Job Description**
**About the Role:**
 Seeking a passionate
 **Senior DevOps** 
**Engineer** 
 with strong expertise in
 **\\#Python** 
 scripting and deep knowledge of CI/CD processes, branching, and merging strategies. You will collaborate with development, QA, and infrastructure teams to design automation workflows, streamline deployments, and elevate software delivery efficiency.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, implement, and maintain scalable Kubernetes clusters (\\#AWS \\#EKS) and workloads.
* Manage Docker containerization and optimize container build pipelines.
* Develop and support CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Devtron for continuous delivery.
* Monitor infrastructure health and application observability using Prometheus\\-Grafana and ELK stack.
* Manage enterprise Kafka clusters for data streaming and messaging.
* Deploy and optimize Redis caches for high\\-performance workloads.
* Administer AWS RDS databases, including backups, replication, and performance tuning.
* Configure CDN solutions (CloudFront, Akamai) for optimal content delivery.
* Troubleshoot networking and Linux OS\\-level issues across environments.
* Ensure infrastructure reliability, scalability, and security compliance.


**Required Technical Skills:**
* Proven experience with Kubernetes (EKS preferred), Docker, and container orchestration.
* Hands\\-on expertise with AWS core services including EC2, S3, RDS, IAM, CloudFront.
* Strong skills in Jenkins, Terraform (IaC), and Ansible automation.
* Proficient in Python scripting and shell/Groovy scripting for automation and workflow optimization.
* Experience with monitoring and logging stacks: Prometheus, Grafana, ELK.
* Knowledge of Kafka and Redis administration is highly desirable.
* Solid understanding of networking principles, security best practices, and cloud architecture.


**Soft Skills:**
* Excellent communication skills to interact effectively with clients and stakeholders.
* Ability to articulate technical solutions clearly and confidently in client\\-facing scenarios.
* Proactive, independent, and self\\-driven approach to project handling.
* Strong analytical, problem\\-solving, and troubleshooting mindset.
* Experience documenting processes, architectures, and solutions clearly.
* AWS and Kubernetes certifications are a plus.


**Project Experience**
 Experience working with enterprise clients handling end\\-to\\-end DevOps responsibilities.
   

  

 Comfortable managing stakeholder\\-driven projects with direct communication and solution ownership.
